objective_title: Build and maintain a network of intertidal larval source reefs (2025–2030)
kr_title: Deploy ~10M live oysters to intertidal plots by 2030
kr_description: Scale live-oyster planting so intertidal/tidal-creek plots collectively reach bay-wide target by end of 2030.

objective_title: Build and maintain a network of intertidal larval source reefs (2025–2030)
kr_title: Create ~200 oyster plots stocked to target density
kr_description: Establish and maintain intertidal plots stocked to ~50 oysters/m²; restock if density falls below threshold.

objective_title: Build and maintain a network of intertidal larval source reefs (2025–2030)
kr_description: Performance standard for plot success across the network.

objective_title: Build and maintain a network of intertidal larval source reefs (2025–2030)
kr_title: Achieve 50% survival rate on each plot
kr_description: Survivorship expectation measured during post-planting surveys (6 months, 1 year, 3 years).

objective_title: Build and maintain a network of intertidal larval source reefs (2025–2030)
kr_title: Increase recruitment on nearby cultch by 30%
kr_description: Measure recruitment/retention changes on nearby cultch relative to baseline (adaptive management metric).
